id: How to Treat a Bartender, According to Bartenders
paragraph: There are lots of easy ways to piss off a bartender, from hollering out your order to leaving a bad tip. So to help you avoid ending up on somebody's bad side next time you go out drinking, we had a handful of bartenders tell us how they like to be treated—along with what makes them want to 86 somebody for life.
